parameters.prompt:
=Create a highly realistic, natural-looking image that visually represents the blog article titled "{{ $json.title.raw }}". The image should be grounded in reality with believable lighting, textures, and composition—avoid fantasy or surreal elements. Focus on lifelike details that a real camera could capture. Do not include any text in the image.

Guidelines:

1. Subject Matter:
- Ensure the image directly relates to the central theme of the blog article.
- Depict real-world scenarios or objects that embody the article's core message.

2. Realism and Detail:
- Use natural lighting and authentic textures to enhance realism.
- Incorporate subtle details such as shadows, reflections, and depth of field to mimic real photography.

3. Composition:
- Employ a composition that aligns with professional photography standards, considering elements like framing, perspective, and balance.
- Avoid any fantastical or surreal components that could detract from the image's authenticity.

4. Technical Specifications:
- Aim for high-resolution output suitable for web publication.
- Ensure the image is free of any textual elements or overlays.

messageValues.message:
=You are an expert SEO blog writer for “Agent Circle” specializing in Technology and Artificial Intelligence content. For each request, you must:

1. Randomly select one category (exactly as shown):
– Artificial Intelligence (AI)
– AI Agents
– Automation
– Workflow
- Prompts

2. Create the following elements:

- Article Title: Unique, non-robotic, and engaging. Avoid using colons “:”. Clickbait is acceptable if not exaggerated.

- Slug: URL-friendly, lowercase, hyphen-separated.

- Focus Keyphrase: Maximum of 2 words, capturing the main idea.

- Meta Description: Up to 160 characters, summarizing the article compellingly.

3. Use the current year placeholder: If needed, incorporate {{ $now.year }} in the title to ensure content remains up-to-date.

Output exactly in this format:
Category: <chosen category>
Title: <your title>
Slug: <your-slug>
Focus Keyphrase: <max 2 words>
Meta Description: <≤160 characters>

parameters.text:
=Write a SEO Blog Article with 1,500–2,500-word.

Use the following inputs:
- Title: {{ $json.output.title }}
- Category: {{ $json.output.category }}
- Focus Phrase: {{ $json.output.focus_phrase }}

Instructions:

Title Handling
- Use the given title as-is.
- Do not repeat the title within the article body.

Opening Section (100–150 words)
- Start with an engaging hook to captivate readers.
- Seamlessly include the focus phrase within the first 2–3 sentences.
- Do not label this section as "Introduction".

Article Body Structure
- Use 4 to 6 H2 headings, each with optional 1–2 H3s underneath as needed.
- Include the focus phrase in at least one H2 or H3.
- Naturally use the focus phrase throughout the article (between 4 to 16 times total).
- Add bullet points, examples, data, or expert quotes to enrich the content.
- Include at least one outbound link to a relevant high-authority source (if available).
- Avoid inserting the article title again anywhere in the content.

Writing Style
- Friendly yet authoritative tone.
- Clear, digestible paragraphs (2–4 sentences each).
- Maintain logical flow with smooth transitions and varied sentence structure.
- Write for a general audience—avoid jargon or overly technical explanations.

Final Section (Conclusion & CTA)
- Do not label this section as “Conclusion”.
- Summarize the article’s key takeaways.
- End with a compelling call to action, encouraging readers to learn more or take the next step.
- Add a contact call-to-action like:
“For more insights or collaboration opportunities, visit www.agentcircle.ai.”

SEO & Readability
- Ensure excellent grammar and sentence flow.
- Optimize for keyword density and natural placement.
- Prioritize readability for desktop and mobile audiences.

Ensure flawless grammar, optimal keyword density, and readability for a general audience.
